335 Fenimore: Luxurious Living Near Prospect Park Stunning 2-Bedroom Apartment!
Apartment Features: Air Conditioning Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Appliances Dishwasher Spacious Common Area Pet-Friendly Abundant Natural Light Track Lighting
Building Amenities: Gym Parking Laundry Room Roof Deck Media Room Bike Room
Prime Location: Just 2 blocks from the 2, 5, and Q trains Only 2 blocks from Prospect Park
Enjoy a perfect blend of luxury and convenience in this beautiful unit!

Beautiful 2-Bedroom, 1-Bath Apartment!
Apartment Features:
Air Conditioning for Year-Round Comfort Sleek Hardwood Flooring Throughout Modern Stainless Steel Appliances Convenient Dishwasher Expansive Living and Dining Area Recently Renovated Bathrooms with Elegant Finishes Abundant Natural Light in Every Room Stylish Track Lighting
Pet-Friendly ? Furry Companions Welcome! Available now No broker fee

Luxury Living in Ditmas Park ? No Broker Fee (Photos are of a similar unit with same finishes)
This beautiful elevator building is nestled on a picturesque, tree-lined street and ready for an August 1st move-in!
Apartment Features: Spacious bedrooms with ample closet space
- Generously sized living area - Abundant natural light throughout - Gleaming hardwood floors - Individual split units in each room for personalized climate control
Building Amenities: Resident lounge Fully furnished rooftop and outdoor spaces Bike storage On-site laundry room Co-working space with computer stations and complimentary Wi-Fi State-of-the-art fitness center
Prime Location: Just steps from the B/Q and 2/5 subway lines ? convenient access to everything Brooklyn and beyond has to offer!
No broker fee 8/1 move in Pets welcome

Myspace Exclusive!
Great 1.5 bedroom in trendy Ridgewood! This beautiful unit is bright and sunny with glossy oak flooring. The kitchen has ample storage and counter space with retro white appliances. The bedrooms are spacious with closets. Your heat and hot water is included which will keep you and your pets warm and cozy while saving you money.
Fabulous location that?s literally steps away from the Seneca M! Walking distance to all the Bushwick hotspots like Milk & Pull. Call now, this won?t last long.
10/1 move in Small pets OK

Myspace Exclusive! Beautiful pre-war 2 bedroom in Prime Williamsburg
Located at Roebling and South 3rd --- 4 minutes to the Marcy JMZ
1 sunny bedroom extra office room real living room with great layout ? fits a sofa, coffee table and TV separate kitchen tons of natural light in all rooms
Includes heat and hot water
NO BROKER FEE

Gorgeous renovation in historic prewar building steps from the Myrtle JMZ in prime Bushwick, only a short stroll from the Morgan/Jefferson L!
This beautiful two bedroom features high ceilings, exposed brick, custom moldings, separate eat-in kitchen w/ island, dishwasher, separate living room with tons of natural light, two evenly sized queen bedrooms with closets, lovely hardwood floors, tons of natural light in every room, washer/dryer in unit, additional coat/storage closet in hallway leading to luxe modern bathroom w/ deep soaking tub.
Tucked away from street noise on the second floor facing the back of the property, you will sleep sound! Surrounded by the best selection of bars, restaurants, music/art venues, thrift shops, grocery stores, and transportation options! Steps from Myrtle JMZ express to Lower Manhattan, or a short stroll to the L train at either Morgan or Jefferson!
Only first & security! Heat & hot water included! Available 8/1/2025

Myspace Exclusive! Gorgeous renovation in historic prewar building steps from the Myrtle JMZ in prime Bushwick, only a short stroll from the Morgan/Jefferson L!
This beautiful two bedroom features high ceilings, exposed brick, custom moldings, separate eat-in kitchen w/ island, dishwasher, separate living room with tons of natural light, two evenly sized queen bedrooms with closets, lovely hardwood floors, tons of natural light in every room, washer/dryer in unit, additional coat/storage closet in hallway leading to luxe modern bathroom w/ deep soaking tub.
Tucked away from street noise on the second floor facing the back of the property, you will sleep sound! Surrounded by the best selection of bars, restaurants, music/art venues, thrift shops, grocery stores, and transportation options! Steps from Myrtle JMZ express to Lower Manhattan, or a short stroll to the L train at either Morgan or Jefferson!
Only first & security! Heat & hot water included!

Beautiful pre-war 2 bedroom in Prime Williamsburg
Located at Roebling and South 3rd --- 4 minutes to the Marcy JMZ
2 big sunny bedrooms real living room with great layout -- fits a sofa, coffee table and TV separate kitchen tons of natural light in all rooms inc heat and hot water
September 1st move in Small pets OK

Beautiful 1 bedroom apartment available in Williamsburg, prime location! Nice renovation!
This is the ideal opportunity to live in one of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods. Walk in to a spacious living area with an open kitchen and plenty of dining space. Large bedroom closet. Heat and hot water is included so no need to mind the thermostat. Enjoy a multitude of cafes in your community. Located just a few blocks to Williamsburg Smorgasburg/Flea Market. Cut your commute time to the city with the J, M, Z trains minutes from your door. Bring your small furry friends ? the building allows pets!
Easy commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods. Domino Park, Williamsburg Bridge, etc nearby.
9/1 move in Small pets welcome

Myspace Exclusive!
This incredible one bed bedroom apartment is just south of the Williamsburg Bridge and short distance to some of the best restaurants and bars Brooklyn has to offer! The apartment has an L-shaped living area with big windows, stainless steel kitchen, exposed brick.
The building is an extremely well-maintained 1920s prewar featuring stainless appliances, hardwood floors, tons of sunlight, high ceilings and lots of space. Pet friendly, heat & hot water included!
Call today, as this listing will not last.
September 1 move in Small pets OK Broker fee applies

Beautiful Williamsburg apartment is available August 1!
- 2 very equal and BIG queen sized bedrooms - Real living room that fits a sofa /tv/coffee table and has natural light - Separate kitchen with full sized appliances
ELEVATOR BUILDING!
Because this property is in a prime location, you will be conveniently close to the J, M, and G trains! You?ll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby?s All Right, Patrizia?s, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold.
Small pets only 9/1 move in No broker fee

Gorgeous two bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains. Could also be used a 1 bedroom plus home office. The apartment features: Hardwood floors, Spacious et-in style kitchen with stainless steel appliances, Large living room, 1 queen size and 1 twin size bedroom. Heat & Hot Water is included and there is rooftop access. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
July 1 move in Small pets OK No broker fee

Super sized 2 bedroom in prime Williamsburg!
- no broker fee
2 nice bedrooms Large living area with windows Stainless steel kitchen Heat and hot water included Exposed brick
Perfect location, near all things that make Williamsburg, Williamsburg! JMZ and G trains nearby. Local hotspots such as L'Industrie Pizzeria, Pies 'n' Thighs, Vanessa's Dumpling House, Banter Bar, Nighthawk Cinema, etc
Available 9/1 Small pets accepted

Myspace Exclusive! Large one bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg ? just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, king sized bedroom, ample closet space, large living room and separate kitchen. Pets are welcome. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
NO BROKER FEE! Small pets OK 9/1 move in

Massive 2 bedroom Duplex with basement level and 1000sq PRIVATE yard!
This is a gem. If you need space and you want a massive private year this could be the one!
Call or text to set up immediate viewing.

PRIVATE BACKYARD Amazing boxed 2 bedroom PERFECT location Tons of light
Message to view ASAP!

Sunny penthouse 2 bed / 1 bath with private balcony!
Video is from last winter when there was a large snow storm, but the private terrace is huge and video is from actual unit! Message me if. you can't see the video and I'll send it to you.
Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Large private terrace! Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath with beautiful tile work and granite countertops Floor to ceiling windows Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in all rooms Queen Sized bedrooms Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closet if needed
Building features: Elevator Huge Roof deck ButterflyMX intercom Latch bluetooth lock system Multiple laundry room Parking Zipcars available Bike storage Go Lockers for shipping and receiving packages securely State-of-the-art security system throughout Fantastic location close to tons of cool local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
Pets ok NO fee! Just 1st and security $20 app fee per person Call or text to view the right away.

Huge luxury 2br with private balcony!!
Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath with beautiful tile work and granite countertops Floor to ceiling windows Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in all rooms Queen Sized bedrooms Private balcony is 6ft x 10ft Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closet if needed
Building features: Elevator Laundy Huge Roof deck ButterflyMX intercom Latch bluetooth lock system Parking lot (extra per month and depends on availability) Zipcars available Bike storage State-of-the-art security system throughout Fantastic location close to tons of cool local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
Pets no fee Call or message to view right away

Can be used as a 2br with small common space in the middle or a large 1br. Private outdoor space. Heat and hot water included! Both room are very large. Back room has access to private outdoor space. Custom kitchen with granite countertops, microwave and stainless steel appliances. Large enough for kitchen table and chairs. Large renovated bathroom. Located at Harman right off Knickerbocker Ave. Close to the Knickerbocker M Train or the Dekalb L Train.
Located in the back building away from any street noise. Has a small private outdoor space as well as a very large shared courtyard for the building. See video on streeteasy or message me and I'll send to you.
Pets ok! $20 application fee Heat and hot water included Sorry, no laundry in the building.
Call or text to set up a viewing right away!

2 Bed / 1bath with private balcony, in a brand new elevator building!
Unit features: Private balcony Bedrooms on opposite sides of the large living room Faces the back of the building away from any street noise Sunny 4th floor apartment Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in all rooms. Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closets
Building features: Affordable parking spots available ButterflyMX intercom Multiple laundry rooms Huge Roof deck Zipcars available Bike storage State-of-the-art security system throughout
Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
Pets ok No fee Just 1st and security to move in
Call or text to view the right away!

Large 2BR with queen size rooms, large balcony and huge PRIVATE roof deck and private balcony. Common area big enough for a couch, tv and dining table. The unit features stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and microwave, hardwood floor, white tile kitchen backsplash and bathroom, individual a/c units in each room. Spiral staircase to a small room which opens to your own private roof deck. The building features an elevator, laundry room, roof deck, zip car, security system, and is located in the center of Bushwick!
Building also features 2 large shared roof decks and a laundry room. Parking and zip car services available. Elevator
1/2 a block from the Dekalb L and 5min walk to the M train. NO fee
Call or text to take a look right away!

Beautiful 2.5BR/1.5bath duplex with private yard!!
Looking for tons of space? This could be a 3br or a huge 2br plus basement level. The yard is private to this apartment Spiral staircase going downstairs. Additional set of stairs to the basement level with a door to basement level for easier moving of large items. Hardwood floors Laundry in the building Next to both L and M trains Video and pics of actual unit. If you can?t see the video let me know and I?ll sent it to you. Currently tenant occupied until end of the month.
Pets ok No fee Only First & Security to move in
Contact to schedule your appointment today!

Welcome to 487 Keap, a brand new rental building seconds to Metropolitan/Union Avenue L train Very well maintained ? beautiful common areas including a landscaped roof deck with lounge chairs, bar, and outdoor shower. Full service and spacious gym, bike and additional storage are available.
This apartment is rent stabilized, you can enjoy a rent stabilized home, be protected from sharp increases in rent and have the right to renew your lease for years to come.

Located on a quiet block in prime Williamsburg, this true two-bedroom offers great space and even better location. Both bedrooms have windows, closets, and comfortably fit queen beds. The layout features a separate living room and a renovated kitchen. Just a quick walk to the Bedford L and Marcy JMZ trains, and when you're ready to unwind, head upstairs to the rooftop for wide-open Manhattan views and epic sunsets over the water.

Modern 2br/1bth at 584 4th Ave- Gowanus
Welcome to 584 4th Ave, a brand-new luxury development in the heart of Gowanus. This spacious 2 bed features floor-to-ceiling windows with sweeping views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and city bridges.
Enjoy premium amenities including:
Elevator
Rooftop with panoramic views
Fitness center
In-unit washer/dryer
Located near Park Slope with easy access to the F, G, D, N, and R trains, this building offers the perfect mix of style, comfort, and convenience.
Pets allowed upon approval.
Schedule a tour today!

The Baltic Canal ? Modern Living in Boerum Hill
Studios, 1- & 2-BR homes with oversized windows, white oak floors, custom kitchens, spa-style baths, and in-unit or on-site laundry. Select residences offer private balconies or terraces.
Amenities: Bike room, elevator, package room, gym, media room, and multiple outdoor spaces ? deck, garden, patio & panoramic roof deck.
Unbeatable location at the crossroads of Boerum Hill, Gowanus & Park Slope, near Whole Foods, top restaurants, boutique shops & F/G/R trains.
📅 Schedule your tour today and make The Baltic Canal your next home.

Beautiful 1 bed / 1 bath apartment in Bushwick, prime location! This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Archie's, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse.
Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the L train, and a short walk to the J, M trains.

Spacious 3-Bedroom in the Heart of Bushwick
📍 Near Morgan Ave (L) & Central Ave (M) | Jefferson St & Wilson Ave
This bright and updated 3-bedroom, 1-bath apartment combines modern finishes with classic Brooklyn character. With plenty of space and thoughtful details, it?s ideal for both relaxing and entertaining.
Features: ? High ceilings & hardwood floors ? Eat-in kitchen with stainless steel appliances & granite countertops ? Dishwasher ? Exposed brick accents ? Pet-friendly (with approval)
Set in one of Bushwick?s most vibrant areas, you?re close to parks, markets, and plenty of local spots ? all just a short walk to the L or M train.

Located near Park Slope with easy access to the F, G, D, N, and R trains, this building offers the perfect mix of style, comfort, and convenience.

No Fee ? Luxury 1 Bed / 1 Bath in Brand New Elevator Building in Clinton Hill!
Modern design meets prime location in this spacious 1-bedroom, 1 bath apartment featuring hardwood floors, high ceilings, central A/C, and a private balcony. The open layout is perfect for entertaining, and each bedroom offers great light and flexibility.
Enjoy top-notch amenities including: ? Elevator ? Gym ? Lounge & Game Room ? Shared Workspace & Public Wifi ? Laundry Room & Bike Storage ? Furnished Rooftop with Skyline Views ? Courtyard & Outdoor Spaces ? Dishwasher, Eat-In Kitchen, Stainless Steel Appliances
Just 1 block from the Franklin Ave C/S trains?15 minutes to Manhattan. Close to Outpost, Doris, Sisters, and other local favorites.
First & Security Only | No Fee | Pets on Approval

Welcome to Casa Hope Williamsburg?s new luxury development!
Sunny units with oversized windows throughout, and gorgeous finishes Steps from the L / G trains, commute to Union Square in only 13 minutes door to door!
Tons of building amenities:
Fitness center Rooftop terrace Business center On-site garage parking Lounge on 7th floor Mini lounge nook to each floor Elevator Bike room Parking garage (additional fee)
The kitchen comes equipped with brand new stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. Gorgeous well-designed light wood cabinetry, white stone countertops and backsplashes. Modern bathrooms feature a deep soaking spa bathtub, as well as modern vanity with oversized mirror, storage cabinet space and matte black finishes. Other features include oak flooring throughout and generous closet space. Trash Chute to each floor.
Perfect location with an easy commute to the city and tons of restaurants, bars and cafes nearby Short walk from McCarren Park and the Bedford L train area

Experience Brooklyn living at 1010 Pacific St. You?ll find this community in the Prospect Heights area of Brooklyn. Experience a new standard at 1010 Pacific St.
Pacific House offers a collection of Studio, 1 and 2 Bedroom luxury apartments featuring expansive, open- concept layouts, oak floors and contemporary finishes. Residents also enjoy unparalleled access to first-class amenities, including fitness center, dedicated kids? areas, media lounge and bar and an expansive roof top with view of the city. Pacific House is centrally located in the heart of Brooklyn?s trendy prospect park neighborhood, and in close proximity to major transit hubs and an array of local amenities. Nearby shops, restaurants, schools, outdoor parks, neighborhood services, arts and culture are all within easy reach.

77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

A household of min 2 is required (up to 5). Solo occupants are not eligible Minimum combined Income required: $87k Max combined income for 2 households $168k (Max can be higher for bigger households) Assets limited to $210k
No-Fee Modern 2BR | 95-08 147th Pl, Jamaica, NY Now leasing in a newly constructed luxury building in the heart of Jamaica, Queens. This spacious 2-bedroom residence features a private balcony and modern finishes throughout. Available now with no broker fee.
Apartment & Building Features:
Private Balcony
Laundry Room
Fitness Center & Recreation Room
Bike Storage
Package Room
Roof Terrace with City Views
